summary: Comprehensive testing of KasaBurger Unified Kitchen (Birleşik Mutfak) feature completed. All backend APIs working correctly (14/14 tests passed). Frontend pages /mutfak and /salon-ekran fully functional. Queue number system working: MASA-X for table orders, PKT-XXXX for package/kiosk, ONLNPKT-XXXX for online platforms.
passed_tests: GET /api/kitchen/orders - Returns all kitchen orders from POS, Kiosk, Delivery
GET /api/kitchen/stats - Returns pending/preparing/ready counts with breakdown
PUT /api/kitchen/orders/{id}/status - Updates order status (preparing, ready, served)
POST /api/pos/orders - Takeaway orders get PKT-XXXX queue number
POST /api/pos/orders - Table orders get MASA-X queue number
POST /api/kitchen/print - Print endpoint exists (MOCKED - no real printer)
Full kitchen workflow: create order -> update status -> check salon display
Order cards display correctly with color-coded borders (orange=MASA, green=PKT, pink=ONLNPKT)
Status update buttons (Hazırla, Teslim) work correctly
Filter buttons (Tümü, Bekleyen, Hazırlanıyor, Hazır) work
Stats display (Bekleyen, Hazırlanıyor, Hazır counts) updates correctly
critical_code_review_comments: Code quality is good - proper separation of concerns in kitchen.py router
Queue number system correctly implemented with daily reset using queue_counters collection
Salon display endpoint correctly excludes auth requirement for public display
Order status flow properly tracks timestamps (preparing_at, ready_at, served_at)
seed_data_creation: Created test orders during testing: PKT-0002 to PKT-0005, MASA-1 orders

mocked_apis.POST /api/kitchen/print: Thermal printer integration is MOCKED - returns queue_number but cannot connect to real printer
